This final note today from the Marketplace Desk of, "c'mon...how did you not see this coming?"

The cold weather equivalent of frying an egg on the sidewalk is, of course, throwing boiling water into the frigid air to watch it freeze.

So here is today's lesson in don't let this happen to you:

Marketplace angle? None.
title: Seriously, keep that boiling water in the pot
teaser: Tossing boiling water in the air in subzero temperatures will only get you burned.
